basics.name: Enmanuel Gerardo Alfonzo
basics.label: Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience
basics.summary: Over 5 years of experience as a Web Developer. Currently holding the position of Developer Lead Frontend Architect at ICIVA, where I lead a frontend development team and contribute to building high-impact technological solutions. Throughout my career, I've had the opportunity to work in various environments, from fintech to SaaS, acquiring a wide range of skills and experience.

work.name: Enmanuel Gerardo Alfonzo
summary: At ICIVA, I took a proactive role in modernizing various core products, both for users and internal use. I led the improvement of the event creation platform by integrating payment gateways, implementing Socket.io for real-time management, and creating a role-based administration portal. Additionally, I migrated internal tools to modern versions of Node.js. My experience in modernizing web applications, my technical skills, and my problem-solving approach allowed me to contribute significantly to the success of these projects.

At Magnettu, I played a key role in building solutions that enhanced user experience and streamlined communication. I designed and developed an employee management module that facilitated targeted delivery of content on social media. Furthermore, I improved the email module, created a chat module for clients, and optimized the text editor for efficient content creation. My full-stack development skills, using React, GraphQL, TypeScript, Context, OpenAPI, Node.js, and Express, enabled me to contribute significantly to Magnettu's growth.

work.name: Zulu
summary: In my role as a full-stack developer, I was responsible for designing and implementing new features for two key products:

Administration Portal: I created a platform that allows viewing all transactions made in the Zulu application. I implemented a fraud module where suspicious transactions can be viewed and edited. I developed a countries module to manage information such as liquidity provider, area code, and more. This tool was built using Next.js.

Zulu Application: I led the development of the functionalities necessary to enable new countries like Mexico and Peru. I made changes in various modules of the application, including KYC, Cash In, Cash Out, Send and Receive. I ensured that all processes can be modified from the administration portal.

work.name: Simpol
summary: Designed and built a complete wallet application for earning rewards through UST staking. Documented and implemented micro-frontends within the Simpol application. Implemented improvements and new features in the existing Simpol application.
Migrated the codebase of the Simpol application to React Native.

work.name: Vikua
summary: Started as an intern and transitioned to a Hardware and Software Engineer role, contributing to the development and maintenance of data services for smart city analysis.
Assisted in designing and implementing solutions for data acquisition, processing, and visualization, enabling better decision-making for urban planning and management.
highlights: Transitioned from Internship to Full-Time Role
Contributed to Smart City Data Analysis Solutions
